# SharedCoordinateSpaceProvider

**Class**

Provides ability to establish a shared coordinate space among multiple participants.

## Declaration

```swift
final class SharedCoordinateSpaceProvider
```

## Structures

- **SharedCoordinateSpaceProvider.CoordinateSpaceData**: A coordinate space data.

## Initializers

- **init()**: Create a shared coordinate space provider.

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A textual representation of this SharedCoordinateSpaceProvider.
- **eventUpdates**: A sequence of events that have occurred.
- **nextCoordinateSpaceData**: Get the next coordinate space data to be broadcast to all participants.
- **participantIdentifier**: Get the identifier of the local participant.
- **state**: The state of this shared coordinate space provider.

## Instance Methods

- **push(data:)**: Push data to shared coordinate space provider.

## Type Properties

- **isSupported**: Determines whether this device supports the shared coordinate space provider.
- **requiredAuthorizations**: The authorization type(s) required by the shared coordinate space provider.

## Enumerations

- **SharedCoordinateSpaceProvider.Event**: Events that can occur in a shared coordinate space.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- DataProvider
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
